short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing a location in Google Maps or Zillow, this extension will open the same location in Zillow or Google Maps, respectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables the user to navigate between the map views on Zillow and Google Maps. So if you're viewing a map location or a singular address on Google Maps, and you want to see the same location or address on Zillow, click the button and a new tab will open up with that exact location or property displayed in Zillow.

This functionality works the same way if you're viewing a map location in Zillow--the button will open a new tab with the corresponding location Google Maps.

This extension only works on google.com and zillow.com.
